articles.author: Jeff Yeung
articles.title: China Discovers New "Dragon Man" Human Species - HYPEBEAST
articles.description: Living in East Asia over 146,000 years ago.
articles.content:
Scientists in China have now discovered a new species of humans they nicknamed “Dragon Man.”
Originally uncovered back in 1933, the skull of the Dragon Man is significantly larger than our own, but … [+1252 chars]

articles.title: Fully vaccinated people generally protected from Covid-19 but can still transmit disease to others - AsiaOne

articles.title: 7-year-old boy cycles from Bukit Panjang to Coney Island in just 5 hours - AsiaOne
articles.description: Not all of us can achieve what this boy did at just seven. Afi, the young and proud Singaporean, cycled 75.3km from Bukit Panjang to Coney Island in just five hours. He achieved this incredible feat on June 20, breaking his previous record of 50 km. Afi start…
articles.content:
Not all of us can achieve what this boy did at just seven. Afi, the young and proud Singaporean, cycled 75.3km from Bukit Panjang to Coney Island in just five hours.
